name: funny horses for kids - free game
name_original: funny horses for kids - free game
description:
fun horse for children - free game

This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8).

This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:

Here is a shot duck that will entertain your child. The aim of the game is to make as many points. It's necessary for it to reach the most possible duck and avoid touching the red ducks. When a level is successful a horse picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:

In this game butterflies carrying targets. Your child must shoot the targets to release butterflies and help them fly. Maximum score's necessary to go to the next level. When a level is successful a horse picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of horses.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of horses to be released.

The following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
